Emotional Problems
                
No studies have shown that pituitary hGH causes changes in personality, emotional problems, or suicide.",NIDDK,National Hormone and Pituitary Program (NHPP): Information for People Treated with Pituitary Human Growth Hormone (Comprehensive Report)
